title: Kim Kardashian visits her KKW Beauty display at Ulta with Kourtney ahead of her 39th birthday
text:
Kim Kardashian is enjoying a week of celebrating with friends and family, leading up to her 39th birthday.

And her most exciting birthday gift yet might be that her KKW Beauty products have come to Ulta Beauty.

She and big sister Kourtney Kardashian took to Instagram Sunday as they visited their local Ulta to see the display.

In stores: Kim Kardashian and big sister Kourtney took to Instagram Sunday as they visited their local Ulta to see the brand new KKW Beauty display

Kourtney shared a video to her story as she arrived at the beauty store to surprise the birthday girl.

She found Kim strolling the aisle and feigned excitement, saying: 'Woah, it's Kim Kardashian West!'

Kim also posted a photo of the display, featuring a life-size photo of herself, captioned: 'Today is the day!!! I’m so excited that @kkwbeauty is now available at all @ultabeauty stores! This is such a dream come true!!'

She also received an interesting gift when she got home to find a full-size House of the Dead arcade game in her living room.

Birthday shopping: Kourtney shared a video to her story as she arrived at the beauty store to surprise the birthday girl

She's famous: She found Kim strolling the aisle and feigned excitement, saying: 'Woah, it's Kim Kardashian West!'

Best birthday ever: Kim also posted a photo of the display, featuring a life-size photo of herself, captioned: 'Today is the day!!! I’m so excited that @kkwbeauty is now available at all @ultabeauty stores! This is such a dream come true!!'

Despite it being her birthday, Kim also treated all her friends to individual goody bags filled with all her products.

The 38-year-old was in Palm Springs for the weekend with her best friends and family.

'Ok, so for my birthday, all my besties are opening up [their goodie bags],' she said.

Kim was surrounded by ten of her closest friends including sisters Kourtney, 40, and Khloe, 35.

Surprise! Despite it being Kim Kardashian's birthday, the nearly 39-year-old surprised her 10 best friends, including sisters Khloe and Kourtney, with Skims goodie bags

Presents for everyone! 'Ok, so for my birthday, all my besties are opening up [their goodie bags],' she said

Everyone's excited! The gift bags included various Skims products including bras and socks as well as her fragrances and a Selfish book

Khloe was in the middle of the group on the floor wearing a Nike crop top and tights.

The gift bags included various Skims products including bras and socks as well as her fragrances and a Selfish book.

'So we got perfume, everyone got a Selfish book, new slides and socks,' she said.

Kim's birthday trip saw her enjoy a special dinner on Saturday night where she got her makeup done by sister Kylie Jenner.

Following the home cooked meal, the group played some rounds of Cards Against Humanity.
description: The 38-year-old was in Palm Springs for the weekend with her best friends and family. Despite it being her birthday, Kim also treated all her friends to individual goody bags filled with all her products.
